item.title: 6 Steps to a New Job
item.description: In this episode, we give you six specific steps you can do today, to help position yourself for your next -- better-- job. Connie Schott hosts, bringing her expertise and experience as a successful Human Resources Professional to this very practical discussion. (And we add a bonus, imagining the possibility of your life without a boss. Are you ready for that?)
item.dc:creator: John Schott
item.itunes:summary:
In this episode, we give you six specific steps you can do today, to help position yourself for your next -- better-- job. Connie Schott hosts, bringing her expertise and experience as a successful Human Resources Professional to this very practical discussion.
(And we add a bonus, imagining the possibility of your life without a boss. Are you ready for that?)

item.title: SMART Goals
item.description: This episode explains how SMART Goals can help you accomplish exactly what you want to in your life. Using the attributes: (S)pecific (M)easurable (A)ttainable (R)ealistic and (T)ime Bound can add power to your goals and actions.
item.dc:creator: John Schott
item.itunes:summary: This episode explains how SMART Goals can help you accomplish exactly what you want to in your life. Using the attributes: (S)pecific (M)easurable (A)ttainable (R)ealistic and (T)ime Bound can add power to your goals and actions.

item.title: The Relaxed and Wealthy Lifestyle
item.description: Defining the Relaxed and Wealthy lifestyle with Strategic Advisor John Schott. Share John's passion for Personal Development. Listen as he empowers YOU to take action, demolish fear and procrastination, and go after your dream. Each episode contains business, marketing and motivational tips, strategies and stories.
item.dc:creator: John Schott
item.itunes:summary:
Defining the Relaxed and Wealthy lifestyle with Strategic Advisor John Schott. Share John's passion for Personal Development. Listen as he empowers YOU to take action, demolish fear and procrastination, and go after your dream.
Each episode contains business, marketing and motivational tips, strategies and stories.
